Text: Filmworks X: In the Mirror of Maya Deren:  The album was released on Zorn's own label, Tzadik Records, in 2001 and contains music that Zorn wrote and recorded for the documentary film "In the Mirror of Maya Deren" on the life and work of Maya Deren directed by Martina Kudlácek.

Triplets:<Martina Kudlácek
